languages.text: {n}Шепоты благоговейного ужаса и восхищения доносятся со всех ярусов трущоб. Сотни глаз устремляются к вам и стоящему на коленях Бригадиру. Склонив голову и прикрыв глаза, он тихо молится.{/n}
{n}Whispers of reverent awe can be heard from every level of the slums. Hundreds of eyes converge on you and the kneeling Foreman, who bows his head, half-closes his eyes, and prays quietly.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Шепоты благоговейного ужаса и восхищения доносятся со всех ярусов трущоб. Сотни глаз устремляются к вам и стоящему на коленях Бригадиру. Склонив голову и прикрыв глаза, он тихо молится.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Puedes oír susurros de admiración reverente desde cada nivel de los suburbios. Cientos de ojos se centran en ti y el Capataz arrodillado, que agacha la cabeza, entrecierra los ojos y reza en voz baja.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Whispers of reverent awe can be heard from every level of the slums. Hundreds of eyes converge on you and the kneeling Foreman, who bows his head, half-closes his eyes, and prays quietly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Puedes oír susurros de admiración reverente desde cada nivel de los suburbios. Cientos de ojos se centran en ti y el Capataz arrodillado, que agacha la cabeza, entrecierra los ojos y reza en voz baja.{/n}

languages.text: {n}スラム街のあらゆる階層から、崇敬の念に満ちた囁きが聞こえてくる。何百もの視線があなたとひざまずく作業長に集まる。作業長は頭を下げ、目を半ば閉じ、静かに祈りを捧げている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Whispers of reverent awe can be heard from every level of the slums. Hundreds of eyes converge on you and the kneeling Foreman, who bows his head, half-closes his eyes, and prays quietly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}スラム街のあらゆる階層から、崇敬の念に満ちた囁きが聞こえてくる。何百もの視線があなたとひざまずく作業長に集まる。作業長は頭を下げ、目を半ば閉じ、静かに祈りを捧げている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你听到贫民窟各个角落都传来了充满敬畏的低语。几百双眼睛死死地盯着你和跪在你面前的工头身上。他低下头，半闭着眼睛，静静祈祷。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Whispers of reverent awe can be heard from every level of the slums. Hundreds of eyes converge on you and the kneeling Foreman, who bows his head, half-closes his eyes, and prays quietly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你听到贫民窟各个角落都传来了充满敬畏的低语。几百双眼睛死死地盯着你和跪在你面前的工头身上。他低下头，半闭着眼睛，静静祈祷。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ehrfurchtsvolles Flüstern ist aus allen Ebenen des Slums zu hören. Hunderte von Augen ruhen auf dir und dem knienden Vorarbeiter, der den Kopf beugt, die Augen halb geschlossen, und leise betet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Whispers of reverent awe can be heard from every level of the slums. Hundreds of eyes converge on you and the kneeling Foreman, who bows his head, half-closes his eyes, and prays quietly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ehrfurchtsvolles Flüstern ist aus allen Ebenen des Slums zu hören. Hunderte von Augen ruhen auf dir und dem knienden Vorarbeiter, der den Kopf beugt, die Augen halb geschlossen, und leise betet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des bas quartiers vous parviennent des chuchotements mêlant crainte et respect. Des centaines d'yeux convergent sur vous et le contremaître agenouillé, qui baisse la tête, les yeux à demi clos, et se met à prier en silence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Whispers of reverent awe can be heard from every level of the slums. Hundreds of eyes converge on you and the kneeling Foreman, who bows his head, half-closes his eyes, and prays quietly.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kenar mahallenin her bir katından huşu dolu, hürmetkâr fısıltılar duyuluyor. Yüzlerce göz, bakışlarını sana ve diz çöken Ustabaşı'na dikiyor. Başını öne eğen Ustabaşı, gözlerini kısarak sessizce dua ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Whispers of reverent awe can be heard from every level of the slums. Hundreds of eyes converge on you and the kneeling Foreman, who bows his head, half-closes his eyes, and prays quietly.{/n}
